org.jivesoftware.openfire.plugin

Class UserServicePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jivesoftware.openfire.plugin.UserServicePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jivesoftware.openfire.container.Plugin, org.jivesoftware.util.PropertyEventListener

    public class UserServicePlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jivesoftware.openfire.container.Plugin, org.jivesoftware.util.PropertyEventListener
    Plugin that allows the administration of users via HTTP requests.

      • disableUser

        public void disableUser(java.lang.String username)
                 throws org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserNotFoundException
        Lock Out on a given username
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the local user to disable.
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserNotFoundException - if the requested user does not exist in the local server.

        Parameters:
        username - the username of the local user to enable.
        Throws:

      • addRosterItem

        public void addRosterItem(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String itemJID,
                 java.lang.String itemName,
                 java.lang.String subscription,
                 java.lang.String groupNames)
                   throws org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserNotFoundException,
                          org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserAlreadyExistsException,
                          org.jivesoftware.openfire.SharedGroupException
        Add new roster item for specified user
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the local user to add roster item to.
        itemJID - the JID of the roster item to be added.
        itemName - the nickname of the roster item.
        subscription - the type of subscription of the roster item. Possible values are: -1(remove), 0(none), 1(to), 2(from), 3(both).
        groupNames - the name of a group to place contact into.
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist in the local server.
        org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserAlreadyExistsException - if roster item with the same JID already exists.
        org.jivesoftware.openfire.SharedGroupException - if roster item cannot be added to a shared group.

      • updateRosterItem

        public void updateRosterItem(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String itemJID,
                    java.lang.String itemName,
                    java.lang.String subscription,
                    java.lang.String groupNames)
                      throws org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserNotFoundException,
                             org.jivesoftware.openfire.SharedGroupException
        Update roster item for specified user
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the local user to update roster item for.
        itemJID - the JID of the roster item to be updated.
        itemName - the nickname of the roster item.
        subscription - the type of subscription of the roster item. Possible values are: -1(remove), 0(none), 1(to), 2(from), 3(both).
        groupNames - the name of a group.
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist in the local server or roster item does not exist.
        org.jivesoftware.openfire.SharedGroupException - if roster item cannot be added to a shared group.

      • deleteRosterItem

        public void deleteRosterItem(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String itemJID)
                      throws org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserNotFoundException,
                             org.jivesoftware.openfire.SharedGroupException
        Delete roster item for specified user. No error returns if nothing to delete.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the local user to add roster item to.
        itemJID - the JID of the roster item to be deleted.
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.openfire.user.UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist in the local server.
        org.jivesoftware.openfire.SharedGroupException - if roster item cannot be deleted from a shared group.

        the secret key.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns true if the user service is enabled. If not enabled, it will not accept requests to create new accounts.
        Returns:
        true if the user service is enabled.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the user service. If not enabled, it will not accept requests to create new accounts.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if the user service should be enabled.
